text: Metis fam, the vote for the Improvement Proposal is live! 🚀 Time to level up our governance game with those fresh changes. Dive in, cast your vote, and let's keep this ecosystem thriving. 🌿🗳️
Some Metis news to keep you all entertained

The vote for Metis Improvement Proposal is now live! We aim to boost participation, reduce Sybil influence, enhance transparency and improve resource allocation. Key changes:
✔️Adjusted voting minimums
✔️Batch voting
✔️Fast-track option
✔️AI-generated summaries and AMAs

🗳️Vote now:
